verses.text: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \add there be\add* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3890"\w* of \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mercies|strong="G3628"\w*,

Fulfil \w ye|strong="G4137"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w be|strong="G5426"\w* \w like|strong="G0846"\w*\w minded|strong="G5426"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G0026"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \add being\add* of one \w accord|strong="G4861"\w*, \w of|strong="G5426"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w*.

\add Let\add* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \add be done\add* \w through|strong="G2596"\w* \w strife|strong="G2052"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w vainglory|strong="G2754"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* in lowliness of \w mind|strong="G5012"\w* \w let|strong="G2233"\w* \w each|strong="G0240"\w* \w esteem|strong="G2233"\w* \w other|strong="G0240"\w* \w better|strong="G5242"\w* than \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Look|strong="G4648"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* on his own \w things|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* on the things of \w others|strong="G2087"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* mind \w be|strong="G5426"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, which \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w form|strong="G3444"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, thought \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w robbery|strong="G0725"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w equal|strong="G2470"\w* with \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w made|strong="G2758"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* of no \w reputation|strong="G2758"\w*, and took upon \w him|strong="G2983"\w* the \w form|strong="G3444"\w* of a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, and was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w likeness|strong="G3667"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* being \w found|strong="G2147"\w* in \w fashion|strong="G4976"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, he \w humbled|strong="G5013"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, and \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5255"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w even|strong="G1161"\w* the \w death|strong="G2288"\w* of the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath highly \w exalted|strong="G5251"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G5483"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w name|strong="G3686"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w above|strong="G5228"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w knee|strong="G1119"\w* should \w bow|strong="G2578"\w*, \w of|strong="G2032"\w* \add things\add* in \w heaven|strong="G2032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add things\add* in \w earth|strong="G1919"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add things\add* under the \w earth|strong="G2709"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* should \w confess|strong="G1843"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add is\add* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w have|strong="G5219"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w obeyed|strong="G5219"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w presence|strong="G3952"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w absence|strong="G0666"\w*, work \w out|strong="G2716"\w* your \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5156"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w do|strong="G1754"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \add his\add* good \w pleasure|strong="G2107"\w*.
\w Do|strong="G4160"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w murmurings|strong="G1112"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w disputings|strong="G1261"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0273"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w harmless|strong="G0185"\w*, the \w sons|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, without \w rebuke|strong="G0298"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w a|strong="G1074"\w* \w crooked|strong="G4646"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perverse|strong="G1294"\w* \w nation|strong="G1074"\w*, \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w shine|strong="G5316"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w lights|strong="G5458"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*;

Holding \w forth|strong="G1907"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G1698"\w* may \w rejoice|strong="G2745"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w have|strong="G5143"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w run|strong="G5143"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w laboured|strong="G2872"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I be \w offered|strong="G4689"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w service|strong="G3009"\w* \w of|strong="G4102"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, I \w joy|strong="G5463"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G4796"\w* with \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* the same \w cause|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G5463"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w joy|strong="G5463"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* rejoice \w with|strong="G4796"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5030"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I \w also|strong="G2504"\w* may be of good \w comfort|strong="G2174"\w*, when I \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w state|strong="G4012"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w likeminded|strong="G2473"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w will|strong="G3309"\w* \w naturally|strong="G1104"\w* care \w for|strong="G3309"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w state|strong="G4012"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* their \w own|strong="G1438"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the things which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christâ€™s|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w son|strong="G5043"\w* with the \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, he hath \w served|strong="G1398"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

\w Him|strong="G5126"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* I \w hope|strong="G1679"\w* to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w presently|strong="G1824"\w*, so soon \w as|strong="G5613"\w* I shall \w see|strong="G0872"\w* how it will go with me.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2064"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5030"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G1161"\w* I supposed \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* to \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w Epaphroditus|strong="G1891"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* companion in \w labour|strong="G4904"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellowsoldier|strong="G4961"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w messenger|strong="G0652"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w ministered|strong="G3011"\w* \w to|strong="G5532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w wants|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1894"\w* he longed \w after|strong="G1971"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was full of \w heaviness|strong="G0085"\w*, because \w that|strong="G1360"\w* ye had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had been \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w sick|strong="G0770"\w* nigh \w unto|strong="G3897"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had mercy \w on|strong="G1653"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* on \w me|strong="G1691"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* I should \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w*.

I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the more \w carefully|strong="G4708"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, when ye \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, ye may \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, and that \w I|strong="G2504"\w* may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* the less \w sorrowful|strong="G0253"\w*.

\w Receive|strong="G4327"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w gladness|strong="G5479"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hold|strong="G2192"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* in \w reputation|strong="G1784"\w*:

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* he was \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, not \w regarding|strong="G3851"\w* his \w life|strong="G5590"\w*, to \w supply|strong="G0378"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w lack|strong="G5303"\w* of \w service|strong="G3009"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.
